listing.name: Board Export (Excel, CSV, PDF, Image)
listing.description:
#Quickly and easily export your Trello boards and card information to share insights and boost the visibility of your team‚Äôs work. üöÄ

![Board export demo](https://orahapps-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/BE+Directory+Listing+gif+-+April+2021.gif)

##The most comprehensive and customisable export tool for Trello. Export only what you need with the widest range of Trello field options. Eliminate the need to perform time-consuming editing with a variety of popular export formats. 

##Why export from Trello?

- **Quickly extract** your Trello boards and cards for reporting, analysis, back-up, distribution, and transfer to other systems. 
- **Easily share information** with stakeholders who aren‚Äôt on your Trello board.
- **Save time** by only exporting the information you need. 
- **Engage your audience** by exporting boards into the format suitable for your target audience.
- **Fully supported** and reliable Power-Up with dedicated support and development team.  

>"Board Export has cut my admin time by 50% when creating my reports from Trello" 
>- Matheus, Board Export user

##How can it help you?

Export nearly every Trello data point including boards, cards, comments, activity log, checklists, advanced lists, due dates and members. (NB - supported fields vary between export formats. For a full breakdown [click here](https://docs.orahapps.com/en/articles/52-board-export) )

![Board Exports in Trello your way](https://hub.adaptavist.com/hubfs/Trello/BE%20-%20your%20way.png)


Fully customisable with the ability to pre-select/deselect the exact fields you want to export. 
![Export only the fields you need with Board Export](https://hub.adaptavist.com/hubfs/Trello/BE%20-%20fields.png)


Export in a variety of formats - Excel, CSV, PDF and image. 
![Variety of external export formats with Board Export](https://hub.adaptavist.com/hubfs/Trello/BE%20-%20formats2.png)
To view an example Trello board click [here](http://bit.ly/3psC9to). And to view the sample export files click: [CSV](https://bit.ly/3xZtsLM), [Excel](https://bit.ly/3uFdC6T), [PDF](https://bit.ly/33wmRKD), [Image](https://bit.ly/2Sz1vKs)


24/7 support team 
![A full support team to help with Board Export](https://hub.adaptavist.com/hubfs/Trello/BE%20-%20support.png)


##Use Cases
üìà  - Share a spreadsheet with clients to update them on your progress. 
‚úâÔ∏è  - Email stakeholders a weekly status report by embedding an image of your board
üóÑÔ∏è  - Maintain an archive of all your lists and cards with a PDF/Excel download
üñºÔ∏è  - Download an image/screenshot of your board to print off or showcase in a presentation

##Pricing
All users start on a 14-day free trial of the Power-up (limited to 5 cards per export) and can upgrade anytime to one of the below plans. 
**Annual billing**: $24/year ($2/month) per user for unlimited Trello boards.
OR
**Monthly billing**: $7.50/month per user for unlimited Trello boards.
(You're purchasing a license key for _one user_, not an entire board's worth of users)
NB: All cards on your board can be exported with this Power-Up, regardless of if you created/are assigned to a card.


##Helpful links 
üìù  [Blogs](https://www.orahapps.com/resources/blog?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=trello_directory&utm_campaign=tpwup__marketplace-listing_board-export-directory-listing_all_2021-05-13) 
üìπ  [Video tutorials](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrqmyoEdH8mMHIIpbEAxTFA)
‚ÑπÔ∏è  [Help centre](https://docs.orahapps.com/en?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=trello_directory&utm_campaign=tpwup__marketplace-listing_board-export-directory-listing_all_2021-05-13) 


##Legal
By using this Power-Up you agree to our [EULA](https://www.orahapps.com/eula?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=trello_directory&utm_campaign=tpwup__marketplace-listing_board-export-directory-listing_all_2021-05-13), [Terms and Conditions](https://orahapps.com/terms?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=trello_directory&utm_campaign=tpwup__marketplace-listing_board-export-directory-listing_all_2021-05-13), and [Privacy Policy.](https://www.orahapps.com/privacy?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=trello_directory&utm_campaign=tpwup__marketplace-listing_board-export-directory-listing_all_2021-05-13)

Learn more about Orah Apps and our full suite of Trello Power-Ups at [www.orahapps.com/trello-powerups](https://www.orahapps.com/trello-powerups?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=trello_directory&utm_campaign=tpwup__marketplace-listing_board-export-directory-listing_all_2021-05-13)

listing.name: GitHub
listing.description:
El Power-Up GitHub de Trello permite a los equipos supervisar todo lo que ocurre en GitHub desde sus tableros de Trello. A√±ada perspectivas a su base de c√≥digo adjuntando solicitudes de extracci√≥n, incidencias, ramas y mucho m√°s a sus respectivas tarjetas. Consulte de un vistazo si una perspectiva se ha fusionado, el estado de las comprobaciones, qui√©n est√° asignado a una perspectiva, etc. Las comprobaciones tambi√©n se mostrar√°n de manera destacada en la parte delantera de las tarjetas con colores que indican su estado.

- Adjunte ramas, confirmaciones, incidencias y solicitudes de extracci√≥n directamente a las tarjetas.
- Consulte el estado de las solicitudes de extracci√≥n en la parte delantera de las tarjetas.
- Identifique las tarjetas que no hayan superado las comprobaciones con los indicadores de color que aparecen en la parte delantera.
- Los desarrolladores y responsables pueden ir f√°cilmente a GitHub para trabajar en las tareas asignadas con un simple clic.
- Asocie uno o m√°s repositorios de GitHub a un tablero.
- El Power-Up GitHub admite las instancias GitHub y GitHub Enterprise.
